Name: Whitestone "Meichuu" Standing Lamp
Desc: A cleverly designed Inazuman street lamp that was made out of pure white stone.\nIt is said that the swirling sounds of thunder will remain on this lamp, thus displaying the Raiden Shogun's might. However, none of the childrens' special experiments have resulted in them hearing any such thunderous echoes.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
